Name: Pan Panda
About the game: There are pandas. You find them and save them from the little yellow creatures. I dunno... I like 3rd person action games so I made this. I'll just keep doing updates and stuff. So it's basically capture the flag with pandas instead of flags, and they're randomly placed around the school so you have to run around looking for them, and every time you rescue one the enemies increase in number. And you power up your weapon by defeating enough enemies like most 3rd person action games, and there's a high score mode where you get back any lost lives every time you rescue enough pandas. It's only like 5 minutes long. I'm just gonna see what needs expanding or changing and build on it as I go.
